name: Racing Extreme Stunts
description:
If you are a very fast speed stunting car racer and have given the position for stunt car racing games, then you are ready to experience the real new stunt car rally in the mid of sky with no limits of speed. The fantastic and amazing car stunts will blow your mind.

Game Features:
- Easy to use car controls
- Awesome quality HD graphics
- Real engine sounds
- Dangerous hill mountain environment
- Fabulous sound effects
- Impossible tracks Stunt Master Car racing
